wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Connaboy (10 November 1911 – 1974), generally known as Tommy or Tom Connaboy, was a Scottish footballer who played in the Scottish League for Arbroath, Leith Athletic and Alloa Athletic, in the English Football League for Darlington, in Scottish Junior football for Arniston Rangers, and in the Lancashire Combination for Bangor City. He played mainly at inside right, but also at inside left and wing half.
